review: Amazon offered a great deal on the stick but I had too much of a problem trying to get it to connect to our home wi-fi.  We had not experienced any other problems with devices connecting, so I don't know what the issue was, but I tried several times and never could make the connection last.  Tried support and info from other users but no-go.  Bought Roku -- no connectivity problems whatsoever.
author: Woodlandslady

review: This works well.  My only complaint is the network connection goes down ever week or two.  Then I've got to unplug it from the power supply and plug it back in.  After that it works like a charm again.
